name: Saci
description: The legend says that the saci wears a red cap and often smokes a pipe. Another striking feature is the fact that he has only one leg and, therefore, he moves around by jumping. The saci is a very agitated being and, therefore, it is frequently carrying out some pranks in the places it passes by. When a whirlpool occurs, saci is always present in it to raise dust. Legend has it that saci lives to 77 years of age and then turns into a poisonous mushroom. <Crypto Legends | A Series by Renancio Monte | 2021> <Crypto Legends | A Series by Renancio Monte | 2021>
